items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 490 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 99!

user.bio: I’m thirsty for New England with sunray around the world.

items.checkin_comment:
7.1% stout on nitro.
Smooth, creamy, distinct but muted raspberry, hints of vanilla, all on a chocolate base.
Tasty.

items.badge_description: Celebrate one of the fastest growing sports in the world with this exclusive National Disc Golf Day badge sponsored by the Disc Golf Pro Tour. Disc golf is easy to learn, affordable to play, and accessible to all ages and skill levels. Played much like traditional golf but with flying discs and chain baskets, the game blends precision, strategy, and athleticism with serene natural environments. The best disc golfers in the world play on the Disc Golf Pro Tour. You can watch the Disc Golf Pro Tour for FREE on the JomezPro YouTube channel! WATCH DISC GOLF HIGHLIGHTS

items.checkin_comment: Quite good, but if it was a bit thicker in texture it would be better.

items.checkin_comment: This is a nitro stout & may have been described as a dessert stout which it's not. A dry cherry ripe bar beer save the chocolate is milk not dark & the cherry is raspberry. Nice. And nice to see Vis get off as he should. Italians are lovers not fighters!
Tastes like raspberries and chocolate. A very good desert beer
Malty soft with lactose initially and raspberries making a later appearance. A remarkably fine brew but the OG hazy just has the edge for me today
